name: Classic Brick Game
description:
We are proud to bring you the classic brick game console on your ipad devices.

The game is fantastic experience for the classic brick matching game that once we used to play in classic consoles.

We bring the same look and feel of the classic console with this game, you will surely travel back to your school or college days.

We are confident this will bring you back your old memories and sentiments that were attached with our age old classic brick game consoles.

The game has 5 different levels to compete with. It has 5 levels of speeds and various customisation settings that will give you the nostalgic console experience.

So, what are you waiting for, go ahead and download this free game and get your self travel back to your memorable childhood days...

Please do rate us and leave your comments. We are committed to bring more such retro type games. Your appreciation will definitely help us to dedicate our time on retro style games more.
